_source.text: 1 bulb garlic cloves, large, 1/4-inch-slice cut off top 6 large baking potatoes, washed and pierced with a fork 6 slices Canadian bacon 4 teaspoons Chicken flavored Better than Bouillon mixed with 4 cups water 1 1/2 Tbsp thyme, fresh, chopped 1/2 tsp table salt 1/4 tsp black pepper, freshly ground 6 Tbsp fat free sour cream 6 Tbsp fat free shredded cheddar cheese 6 Tbsp scallion(s), sliced
